summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 NISSAN TITAN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT 30 MPH, THE VEHICLE'S CRACKED EXHAUST MANIFOLD CAUSED EXHAUST FUMES TO ENTER THE CABIN OF THE VEHICLE. THE DEALER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 84,000.
